name: IEEE--2019 4th International Conference on Control and Robotics Engineering (ICCRE 2019)--EI Compendex and Scopus
content: All submissions will be peer reviewed, and all the accepted papers will be published in the ICCRE 2018 conference Proceedings, and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex. ICCRE 2016,2017 and 2018 have been included in the IEEE Xplore! The proceeding of 2016 and 2017 has been indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus successfully!
